DataElement.preferredName: Patient Fatigue Average Assessment Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to describe the patient's assessment of average fatigue level, rated on a Likert Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the patient's assessment of the average (the central tendency of a set of numbers) fatigue level.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: The state of weariness following a period of exertion, mental or physical, characterized by a decreased capacity for work and reduced efficiency to respond to stimuli.:The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Overall tiredness and lack of energy.
A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.
